span.span: Thank you to everyone for their patience during this challenging time. We recognize the significant impact the extended closure will have on our community, students, families and staff. While the classrooms will be empty, our work on behalf of children continues. We are committed to keeping you updated with information as soon as it becomes available.

p.span: 4.1.2020 School Closure Updates From Superintendent Mengerink

span.p: Driver's Ed Classes Canceled All upcoming drivers education classes scheduled in Elida High School are canceled until further notice. If questions please contact the Drivers Education Training Manager Mr. Sam Boyer at 419-235-3776.

p.span: During Governor DeWine's press conference on March 20, he announced the school buildings would remain closed through May 1st. All learning will continue to be done online. Please continue to keep up with your school work through Schoology!

3.12.2020 Following Governor Mike DeWine's announcement on March 12, 2020, Elida Schools will be closed BEGINNING Monday, March 16-April 3, 2020. All school building activities including school day instruction, athletics/sports, etc. are canceled until further notice.
Athletic practices and large gatherings are canceled. Some events are being re-scheduled and we will share that info. as it becomes available.

span.span: LOG-IN INFORMATION FOR PARENTS AND STUDENTS

span.p: Meal Distribution Mondays and Wednesdays 10:30-11:30 am Lima Community Church near Axis Bldg. & Temple Christian School/Lima Baptist Temple parking lots. Convenient Drive-Up

Elida counselors are here to help: Stefanie Atwater satwater@elida.k12.oh.us.Kathy Magers kmagers@elida.k12.oh.us Stacy McAdams smcadams@elida.k12.oh.us Jennifer Knippen jknippen@elida.k12.oh.us Randy Woods rwoods@elida.k12.oh.us

span.span: Free Spectrum WiFi up to 3 months: Call 1-844-488-8395

font.span: Information on in-demand jobs, unemployment and more.

span.p: Food, Cash & Medical Assistance The Ohio Department of Job and Family Services provides food, cash and medical assistance to individuals and families in need. To review eligibility requirements and apply for assistance, please visit:https://benefits.ohio.gov/.
